name: justmath
author: Daniel Wirtz <dcode@dcode.io>
description: An implementation of two dimensional vector math including a rich toolset for vector operations.

scripts.make: npm run-script compile && npm run-script noexpose && npm test && npm run-script jsdoc
scripts.compile: java -jar closure-compiler/compiler.jar --create_source_map JustMath.min.map --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --js JustMath.js --js_output_file JustMath.min.js
